F

findHome() - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
The ghost never forgets where it's home is.
findNextDirection(Actor) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
Decide which method will be used to find the next direction to move depending on the difficulty.
findNextDirectionEasy(Actor) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
If the ghost runs on EASY mode, it runs around randomly until it's close enough to PacMan.
findNextDirectionHard(Actor) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
If the ghost runs on HARD mode, it uses the A*-algorithm to find the shortest path that leads directly to PacMan.
findNextDirectionMedium(Actor) - Method in class uas.lntv.pacmangame.Sprites.Enemy
If the ghost runs on MEDIUM mode, it runs around randomly until it's close enough to PacMan.
